content: My PSET buddy dropped the class, so I would love to be assigned to a new one if there is someone that needs it!
subject: New PSET buddy

content: Oops, I posted this to the wrong piazza!

I don't have anyone in need of a buddy atm, sorry! Please start working on your own and feel free to make use of the many office hours we have to get help! If anyone else request a buddy I'll be in touch.
